MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Borth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:16am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation works are required on the electrical network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:41 AM on Monday, 02 November 2020.
